OmniIntegrationProcedure.description: Fetches Account & Contact Id from any given CustomerInteraction or Account Id
OmniIntegrationProcedure.name: VPL-GetAccount_Contact

omniProcessElements.name: CheckAccountId
omniProcessElements.propertySetConfig: { "executionConditionalFormula" : "", "failureConditionalFormula" : "", "failOnStepError" : true, "elementValueMap" : { "SetAccountId" : "=IF(%GetCustomerInterationAccount:Interaction:vlocity_cmt__AccountId__c% == NULL, Id, GetCustomerInterationAccount:Interaction:vlocity_cmt__AccountId__c)" }, "responseJSONPath" : "", "responseJSONNode" : "", "chainOnStep" : false, "actionMessage" : "", "disOnTplt" : false, "label" : "SetValues1", "show" : null }

omniProcessElements.description: To identify the recordtype of the Account
omniProcessElements.name: CheckAccountRecordType
omniProcessElements.propertySetConfig: { "executionConditionalFormula" : "", "failureConditionalFormula" : "", "failOnStepError" : true, "useFormulas" : true, "additionalInput" : { }, "additionalOutput" : { }, "failureResponse" : { }, "sendOnlyAdditionalInput" : false, "returnOnlyAdditionalOutput" : false, "returnOnlyFailureResponse" : false, "responseJSONPath" : "", "responseJSONNode" : "", "sendJSONPath" : "", "sendJSONNode" : "", "bundle" : "VPLGetAccountRecordType", "dataRaptor Input Parameters" : [ { "element" : "CheckAccountId:SetAccountId", "inputParam" : "AccountId" } ], "chainOnStep" : false, "actionMessage" : "", "ignoreCache" : false, "disOnTplt" : false, "label" : "DataRaptorExtractAction2", "show" : null }

omniProcessElements.description: Fetch Account Id & Contact Id from CustomerInteraction Object
omniProcessElements.name: GetCustomerInterationAccount
omniProcessElements.propertySetConfig: { "executionConditionalFormula" : "", "failureConditionalFormula" : "", "failOnStepError" : true, "useFormulas" : true, "additionalInput" : { }, "additionalOutput" : { }, "failureResponse" : { }, "sendOnlyAdditionalInput" : false, "returnOnlyAdditionalOutput" : false, "returnOnlyFailureResponse" : false, "responseJSONPath" : "", "responseJSONNode" : "", "sendJSONPath" : "", "sendJSONNode" : "", "bundle" : "VPLGetCustomerInteractionAccount", "dataRaptor Input Parameters" : [ { "element" : "Id", "inputParam" : "Id" } ], "chainOnStep" : false, "actionMessage" : "", "ignoreCache" : false, "disOnTplt" : false, "label" : "DataRaptorExtractAction1", "show" : null }

omniProcessElements.description: Response Action sends back the desired Account & contact Id
omniProcessElements.name: OutResponse
omniProcessElements.propertySetConfig: { "executionConditionalFormula" : "", "useFormulas" : true, "additionalOutput" : { "AccountId" : "=IF(%GetCustomerInterationAccount:Interaction:vlocity_cmt__AccountId__c% == NULL, Id, GetCustomerInterationAccount:Interaction:vlocity_cmt__AccountId__c)", "AccountRecordType" : "=%CheckAccountRecordType:AccountRecordType%", "BillDeliveryMethod" : "=%CheckAccountRecordType:AccountBillDeliveryMethod%", "ContactId" : "=IF(%GetCustomerInterationAccount:Interaction:ContactId% == NULL, NULL, GetCustomerInterationAccount:Interaction:ContactId)", "ContextAccountName" : "=%CheckAccountRecordType:AccountName%" }, "returnOnlyAdditionalOutput" : true, "returnFullDataJSON" : false, "responseFormat" : "JSON", "responseJSONPath" : "", "responseJSONNode" : "", "sendJSONPath" : "", "sendJSONNode" : "", "responseDefaultData" : { }, "vlcResponseHeaders" : { }, "disOnTplt" : false, "label" : "ResponseAction1", "show" : null }

OmniIntegrationProcedure.propertySetConfig: { "linkToExternalObject" : "", "trackingCustomData" : { }, "includeAllActionsInResponse" : false, "columnsPropertyMap" : [ ], "relationshipFieldsMap" : [ ], "labelSingular" : "", "labelPlural" : "", "description" : "", "nameColumn" : "", "rollbackOnError" : false, "chainableQueriesLimit" : 50, "chainableDMLStatementsLimit" : null, "chainableCpuLimit" : 2000, "chainableHeapSizeLimit" : null, "chainableDMLRowsLimit" : null, "chainableQueryRowsLimit" : null, "chainableSoslQueriesLimit" : null, "chainableActualTimeLimit" : null, "additionalChainableResponse" : { }, "queueableChainableQueriesLimit" : 120, "queueableChainableCpuLimit" : 40000, "queueableChainableHeapSizeLimit" : 6, "ttlMinutes" : 5, "mockResponseMap" : { } }
